Articles.Content: Right now you can open parachutes while re entering, and they will always slow you down enough before they burn off, making re-entry heating a non factor. This should be fixed
Yes, this is a bad thing.
Agreed. Also the semi-deployed state is WAAAY too strong. I've tried to mod the files to fix it, but it seems to be ignoring the semi-deployed drag factor number entirely.
Maybe they should burn. I don't know how it would work IRL.
